comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

1) Installed Firefox 6.0 Beta 1 and created a new profile.
2) Selected Tools > Feedback > All Your User Studies from the menu bar.


Actual results:

Your Test Pilot Studies window popped up displaying "Loading, please wait..."
The "Loading, please wait..." message persists indefinitely (at least 30 minutes).


Expected results:

"Loading, please wait..." should have been replaced with a more informative message in a timely manner.
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0

Steps to reproduce:

1) Installed Firefox 6.0 Beta 1 and created a new profile.
2) Selected Tools > Feedback > All Your User Studies from the menu bar.


Actual results:

Your Test Pilot Studies window popped up displaying "Loading, please wait..."
The "Loading, please wait..." message persists indefinitely (at least 30 minutes).


Expected results:

"Loading, please wait..." should have been replaced with a more informative message in a timely manner.
I get the same result too.
